sources.title: The Scratch
sources.description: Jake, a rookie private eye, spends each day minding a small private investigation office and filing papers. Dying for more action Jake jumps at the chance to be in on a big score. His boss, Fred, outlines the heist that will make the whole team rich and tells them about a kidnapped computer hacker who downloaded something he shouldn't have.

metadata.Plot: Jake, a rookie private eye, spends each day minding a small private investigation office and filing papers. Dying for more action Jake jumps at the chance to be in on a big score. His boss, Fred, outlines the heist that will make the whole team rich and tells them about a kidnapped computer hacker who downloaded something he shouldn't have. Therein lies the caper: rescue the hacker and retrieve the downloaded booty for themselves. But things don't always go as planned. The heist turns deadly when a hidden agenda is revealed leading to an explosive climax of betrayal and revenge.
metadata.Actors: Jason Adkins, Brian Forrest, Phil Idrissi
